value.halfverse: and my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Savior.
value.verse: My soul doth magnify the Lord, *

value.halfverse: all generations shall call me blessed.

value.verse: For he that is mighty hath magnified me, *
And his mercy is on them that fear him *

value.halfverse: he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.
value.verse: He hath showed strength with his arm; *
He hath put down the mighty from their seat, *
value.halfverse: and hath exalted the humble and meek.

value.verse: He hath filled the hungry with good things, *
value.halfverse: and the rich he hath sent empty away.

value.verse: He remembering his mercy hath holpen his servant Israel, *
value.halfverse:
as he promised to our forefathers,
Abraham and his seed for ever.
